document.title: Pellete de liens du 30-07-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Boing Boing: Microsoft "Genuine Advantage" cracked in 24h: window.g_sDisableWGACheck='all' ( via ) Before pressing 'Custom' or 'Express' buttons paste this text to the address bar and press enter: javascript:void(window.g_sDisableWGACheck='all') (Tags: microsoft haha )
Mozilla Firefox Search Plugin Generator Mozilla Firefox Search Plugin Generator (Tags: mozilla firefox extension moteur plugin )
Hide CSS from browsers :: @import Genial : ces regles d'ecritures permettent de masquer une feuille de style pour tel ou tel navigateur. (Tags: css webdesign conception browsers )
